What is exploitation ?: When people talk about exploitation in public, they tend to be pretty left leaning.
But beyond the obvious cases of rights infrigement we hear about from time to time, the accusation of exploitation is thrown around even in cases where a majority might not see any problem.
But why is that ? Is it simply outrage for the sake of outrage ? Or are people woking with different definitions of exploitation ?
In an attempt to answer that question, we'll have to start with a pretty basic definition of what most people mean by "exploitation".
Exploitation is the taking of profit at the disadvantage of someone else.
